scripts.deploy: webpack; aws --region ap-northeast-1 --profile nonchang-net-personal-AWS s3 sync --delete ./dist s3://nonchang.net/test/webgl

scripts_unuse.comment: 使ってないscriptsはここに一旦退避します
scripts_unuse.deploy-exact-timestamps: webpack; aws --region ap-northeast-1 --profile nonchang-net-personal-AWS s3 sync --exact-timestamps --delete ./dist s3://nonchang.net/test/webgl
